data.eml:eml: Two new species of Loboschiza from Cambodia and Vietnam (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethreutinae: Enarmoniini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heppner, John B., Bae, Yang-Seop (2016): Two new species of Loboschiza from Cambodia and Vietnam (Lepidoptera: Tortricidae: Olethreutinae: Enarmoniini). Zootaxa 4169 (1): 171-178, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4169.1.9
